article_title: 1 in 3 rural Kansas hospitals at risk of closing in study
article_text:
Study said Kansas had 17 at-risk hospitals last year

It now says Kansas has 31 at-risk hospitals

article_metadata.title: 1 in 3 rural Kansas hospitals at risk of closing in study | The Wichita Eagle

og.description: A third of Kansas’ rural hospitals are now at risk of closure, according to a national study released Tuesday.
